articles.title: Pakistan Assures Help To US In Recovering Hostages From Afghanistan: Embassy - NDTV
articles.description: Pakistan has assured the US that it would continue to assist America and other countries in recovering their hostages from Afghanistan, but only as "a moral duty" and not under coercion or incentives.
articles.content:
US: Reports said pressuring Pakistan to act on hostage case has succeeded in the past (Representational).
Washington: Pakistan has assured the US that it would continue to assist America and other c… [+2044 chars]

articles.title: Not all who don’t want to be vaccinated against Covid-19 are anti-vaxxers, and why listening is the best way to get them to do so - Malay Mail
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR, June 22 — Mok Keng Yew, 76, said he has little to no qualms about getting vaccinated... but just don’t give him Pfizer. His distrust of the vaccine made by the American pharmaceutical giant is driven by what’s inside it, or at least what he thin…
articles.content:

articles.title: Nintendo of America President Doug Bowser Responds to Reports of New Switch Hardware - IGN SOUTH AFRICA
articles.description: While he didn't give a straight answer, he did shed light on Nintendo's philosophy in regard to advancing technology.
articles.content: While he would neither confirm nor deny the existence of an upgraded Switch, Nintendo of America president Doug Bowser has responded to reports of upgraded hardware by sharing the company's philosoph… [+4127 chars]
